1.content:
while you where at home one day you hear a strange yelp as you turn your computeer on for the first time after the time when your wached to love ru online.
(Its not that you where in love to it but you pretty much seen what mostly happens) while you pass the yelp as a dog from outside you notice how your computer has already booted up."Austin time to go to school" your mom said to you while you where looking at a strange new folder.normaly in would not intrige you this much but the file was called lala, quicly not wanting to worry yourself you quikly pass that of to as a music file a program or a virus made.I need to get it checked you tought asyou packed your computer in your bag.Today you got to school without incident except for strange looks witch are mostly because you said that you heard the yelp and nobody belives you.As the day begins you are quickly sent off to math class with sinore lopez. You have takin spanish from here for about4 years now,but then you realise that you have not done a sheat that was asinged. thinking quickly you dig through your bag and get your computer and open it." hopefully this will be a fancy calculator or something" you say as you click on the file named lala. As soon as you do you get a big flash from your computer that after it dies (both the light and the computer's battery)."great "you say as you tern around to apologise to the person behind you you notice that nobody is acting like it happend including your nabour behind you joel."well at least nobody noticed" you say as youquicly go bak to your locker and do it.the rest of the day up intill lunch is unuventfull. At lunch you talk with your freinds untill you see a shaddowy figurewalking around the school, thinking quickly you decide to follow him into a empty hallway at your school."so you can see me"said the shadowy figure said, "of corse i can your right there in front of me" you replied back.At the time you thought this remark was a good idea ,but in two secounds he knoced you out
1.title: what the hell?
